_source.short_desc: RXNT's cloud-based EHR software streamlines workflows and optimizes the patient experience. Affordable pricing, free setup and support.
_source.long_desc:
RXNT's cloud-based Electronic Health Records (EHR) software streamlines workflows and optimizes the patient care experience. Providers get real-time health and prescription history at the point-of-care, as well as electronic referrals, medical scheduling, and integrated EPCS-certified E-Prescribing (eRx). Patients benefit from the ease of a patient engagement portal and check-in features.

RXNT's EMR solution is HIPAA compliant, supports MACRA and MIPS, and is an ONC certified HIT solution.
_source.pricing_details: Simple, transparent pricing has no "hidden fees" and includes free setup and training, free data transfer, and free in-house support. Plus, 24/7 cloud-based access and regular system upgrades. 10% discount available for annual pricing. Full Suite (All Products): From $170/month. Practice Management Bundle (Billing, Scheduling): From $75/month. EHR Bundle (EHR, ERX, Scheduling): From $100/month. E-Prescribing: $650/year. 2FA token for EPCS = $75/year.
_source.target_audience: RXNT provides integrated, cloud-based software for healthcare specialties of all sizes, from large physician practices to medical billing professionals across the United States.

media.caption: RXNT Electronic Health Records ? Patient Chart Summary. Get an overview of your patient's complete health information, with access to encounters, medications, allergies, labs, and more.
RXNT Scheduling. Manage daily, weekly, and monthly appointments for providers and resources, track multiple locations, and accept payments payment at check-in.
RXNT Patient Health Records ? Portal Dashboard. Enable patients to schedule appointments, send secure messages, review lab results, sign documents and forms, and pay bills online.
RXNT E-Prescribing. Keep track of and search for prescriptions and medication data, with easy access to Recent, Pending, Voided, and Refill prescriptions as well as Pharmacy Requests & Tasking.

related_products.short_desc: Make the switch today to see why 100,000+ health and wellness entrepreneurs trust SimplePractice to run their business.
related_products.features: Focus on clients while SimplePractice does the rest. Maximize your availability by giving clients the option to request appointments online. After you approve a request, you can send paperless intakes and insurance forms directly from the Client Portal. Set up AutoPay to get paid on time, every time. Reduce no-shows with unlimited appointment reminders. Work on-the-go with our mobile app and integrated telehealth platform. Sign up for a free, 30-day trial today to try it out for yourself.

related_products.short_desc: NextGen Healthcare provides ambulatory practices with award-winning solutions along with dedicated support & professional services.
related_products.features: NextGen Healthcare is a leading healthcare software and services company that empowers the transformation of ambulatory care. Our smart, electronic health record solutions - NextGen Office (1-10 physicians) and NextGen Enterprise (10+ physicians) - help ambulatory practices alleviate the burden of documentation, advance clinical outcomes, connect with other health systems, elevate provider and patient satisfaction, streamline the revenue cycle, and foster healthier communities.

related_products.short_desc: Mental health EMR & therapy notes software for practices of all sizes. Lots of features and reports. Free 21 day trial
related_products.features:
EHR practice management software with Wiley Planners add-on, Telehealth for online therapy, mobile responsive interface, client portal, DSM/ICD codes, progress notes, treatment plans, discharge notes, review & co-sign notes, custom forms.  
Billing features: PQRS, claims & ERA/EOB, superbills, credit card service, batch invoice/claims.
Sync with Google/iCal. Voice, text, email reminders. 
Tons of reports included: Payroll, Staff Billing, etc. 
Unlimited document storage, unlimited support.

related_products.short_desc: Our award-winning EHR gives providers greater control, so they can focus on what they do best.
related_products.features: athenaOne organizes the moment of care, performs administrative and quality services to ensure full payment, and tracks all physician orders so doctors can focus on what they do best. Deliver high quality care. With athenaOne, Doctors benefit from continuous access to the best practices of the nation's largest clinical network, the most up-to-date and extensive quality rules and industry guidelines, and 24/7 support.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by over 100,000 mental health professionals, TherapyNotes software helps therapists manage their practices more efficiently.
related_products.features: Trusted by over 100,000 mental health professionals, TherapyNotes helps behavioral health therapists manage their practices more efficiently through an easy-to-use, secure platform for notes, billing, scheduling, and more. TherapyNotes simplifies administrative work, giving practitioners more time and energy to focus on providing effective care for their clients.

related_products.short_desc: Experience best in class clinical tools on iPad, iPhone or web with full charting capability, lab ordering, e-prescribing and more.
related_products.features: Experience superior efficiency and health record integrity with seamlessly integrated cloud based EMR, patient engagement, and billing in DrChrono's integrated platform. Take your charting to the next level with best in class clinical tools on iPad, iPhone or web with full charting capability, along with telemedicine, lab ordering, e-prescribing and more. With pre-built customizable medical forms and smart shortcuts, you can speed up your charting and focus on your patient care.

related_products.short_desc: Enjoy patient data right at your fingertips. Order lab tests and prescriptions in just a few clicks. Stay MU compliant with NueMD EHR.
related_products.features: NueMDs ONC-ATCB Certified electronic health record offers secure, HIPAA-compliant access to internet based technology just like our practice management system. NueMD offers secure, HIPAA-compliant access to software that streamlines the patient care cycle and simplifies administrative tasks to just a few key strokes. Chart, code, and share information with other providers and lab systems simply and quickly. NueMDs established client base of over 24,000 users in 50 states is proof of our succes

related_products.short_desc: Document, schedule, bill, and market to your patients with WebPT, the leading software platform for outpatient physical therapists.
related_products.features: WebPT is the leading EMR software for outpatient physical, occupational, and speech therapy. With 40% market share, WebPT offers scheduling, documentation, billing, outcomes tracking, business reporting, patient engagement tools, and system integrations, WebPT's robust web-based solution is ideal for every outpatient setting regardless of staff size, facility type, or the number of specialties.

related_products.short_desc: AdvancedEHR: Save time & improve clinical outcomes with seamless data transfer, simple charting, ePrescribing, and telemedicine tools.
related_products.features: AdvancedMD EHR/EMR: Practice from anywhere. Run your entire practice from a single program, a single database and a single login. Seamless integration of your clinical & business technologies helps your staff chart, manage tasks, compare data & report for Meaningful Use or MACRA with ease. Our mobile IOS apps means you and your staff are never out of touch with your practice. Improve your physician/patient workflow with AdvancedEHR. Healthier practice = healthier patients.

related_products.short_desc: CareLogic is web-based Electronic Health Record (EHR) system for behavioral health and human services organizations.
related_products.features: CareLogic is a web-based and easy-to-use Electronic Medical Record (EMR) platform designed for enterprise behavioral health and human services organizations with at least 40 users. Our highly configurable EHR platform helps improve outcomes, drive efficiencies and demonstrate performance. Capabilities include scheduling, intake, treatment planning, service documentation, ePrescribing, consumer engagement, telehealth, billing and reporting.

similar_products.short_desc: Kareo a Tebra Company makes it easy to engage with your patients. Build notes and managing patient interactions simply with Kareo EHR!
similar_products.features: Kareo a Tebra Company offers a full-featured EHR designed by a practicing physician to fit the way you think and work. Kareo Clinical is MACRA Certified. Built for the iPad and the web, it gives you great flexibility and the freedom to stay connected with your patient during an exam. Kareo EHR is built for YOU - not just MU (although it's ONC-ACB Certified). Take the worries out of adopting an EHR with Kareo a Tebra Company.

similar_products.short_desc: CareCloud Charts is a comprehensive, cloud-based Electronic Health Record solution that easily adapts to a practice's workflow.
similar_products.features:
CareCloud Charts is a comprehensive, cloud-based Electronic Health Record solution that easily adapts to a practice's workflow. Charts helps physicians become more productive and profitable, while maintaining adaptability and adjusting to the frequent changes in healthcare reform.

Our MU-certified EHR that features real-time patient flows, rich patient summaries, built-in templates, and time-saving clinical documentation to help you treat more patients every day, more efficiently.

similar_products.short_desc: Connect and share current health information from medical records, labs, pharmacies, devices, apps, and patient portals
similar_products.features: Human API is a real-time health intelligence platform enabling companies to build new solutions that deliver better experiences to customers. We are powered by a robust and comprehensive data network that covers 270 million lives and we help organizations turn health data into insights that create new value for consumers and the companies that serve them.

similar_products.short_desc: Practice management, EHR, and billing services for behavioral, mental, and chemical health. Cloud-based, feature-rich, affordable.
similar_products.features: Feature- for-feature, the best value in EHRs.  Exclusively designed for behavioral and mental health providers, Procentive is trusted by thousands of providers to provide the software and services they need to manage their businesses, stay compliant, and be more effective.  Comprehensive, yet easy to use, Procentive EHR is cloud-based and ONC certified.

similar_products.short_desc: AlexiaHtC is a new and affordable EMR/EHR, that is, Internet electronic medical record/electronic health record.
similar_products.features: AlexiaHTC is a modern, integrated, and affordable medical application for solo doctors, small practices, and independent nurse practitioners: EMR/EHR, E-Prescribing, Telemedicine, Medical Billing, Imaging DICOM VIEWER, Laboratory Integration, Provider Connectivity, and Patient Access.

similar_products.short_desc: Fusion is an EMR built specifically to help OTs, PTs, & SLPs spend less time doing paperwork and more time treating patients.
similar_products.features:
From Pediatrics to Geriatrics, Fusion EMR does it all for PTs, OTs & SLPs Practices! Features include billing, scheduling, waitlists, insights, teletherapy, documentation, and more to streamline your clinic!

Thousands of therapists across the country trust Fusion's EMR to make them (and their practices) more efficient.

Sign up for a free demo of Fusion today to find out how you can spend less time doing paperwork and more time treating patients.

similar_products.short_desc: TriMed offers a fully integrated software suite including EHR, PM, Patient Portal, Mobile, Check-in Module, & Telemedicine.
similar_products.features: TriMed offers a complete software suite which includes Electronic Health Records, Practice Management, Patient Portal, Mobile, Check-in Module, and Telemedicine. Our products are fully integrated, so all modules seamlessly work together for your practice. Extremely robust. Very customizable. Template driven. We build our software around your workflow, not the other way around.

similar_products.short_desc: BirchNotes enables users to grow and manage their practice. Designed specifically for mental health and substance abuse providers.
similar_products.features: BirchNotes enables users to grow and manage their practice. Designed specifically for mental health and substance abuse providers. Reduce time at intake with the client portal. Manage individual and group appointments, and meet your clients in person or through integrated Telehealth. Complete quick and easy charting with smart-fill and speech to text functionality. Set up autopay and require payment prior to your session to increase revenue. Schedule a demo today to learn more.

similar_products.short_desc: TenEleven's electronic Clinical Record (eCR) solution provides the framework to thrive in a performance-based payment system.
similar_products.features: TenEleven Group is a software and services company, focused on providing solutions for health and human services agencies to manage their end-to-end business process. electronic Clinical Record (eCR) is an enterprise-level EHR solution for agencies with more than 10 users and provides solutions for a variety of service types. Inpatient, Outpatient, Community Based Services, and Medication-Assisted Treatment with medication dispensing functionality and dedicated billing services.

Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Chiropractic software automates practice management, billing, scheduling, patient care and reporting for chiropractic offices. Chiropractic offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential patient care and medical business processes including: compilation of chiropractic SOAP notes and patient report generation, treatment records, accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, chiropractic practice management, electronic claims, collections and financial reporting. Chiropractic software is related to other Capterra directories like: Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Physical Therapy software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

_source.short_desc: RXNT's award-winning, integrated suite of healthcare software optimizes clinical outcomes and revenue management for your practice.
_source.long_desc:
RXNT's integrated suite of healthcare software optimizes clinical outcomes and RCM for your practice. Get cloud-based Practice Management with Billing & Scheduling, Electronic Health Records with Patient Portal, or certified E-Prescribing (eRx) software. Predictable, transparent pricing includes free setup, training, support, mobile apps, and more.

Our unified "Full Suite" system employs a secure, central database so your data passes through every product in real-time, no matter the device.
_source.pricing_details: Simple, transparent pricing has no "hidden fees" and includes free setup and training, free data transfer, and free in-house support. Plus, 24/7 cloud-based access and regular system upgrades. 10% discount available for annual pricing. Full Suite (All Products): From $170/month. Practice Management Bundle (Billing, Scheduling): From $75/month. EHR Bundle (EHR, ERX, Scheduling): From $100/month. E-Prescribing: $650/year. 2FA token for EPCS = $75/year.
_source.target_audience: RXNT provides integrated, cloud-based software for healthcare specialties of all sizes, from large physician practices to medical billing professionals across the United States.

media.caption: RXNT Medical Billing - Dashboard. Manage your business and get paid faster. Keep track of charges, claims, aging, payments, alerts, and more at-a-glance.
RXNT Electronic Health Records ? Patient Chart Summary. Get an overview of your patient's complete health information, with access to encounters, medications, allergies, labs, and more.
RXNT Scheduling. Manage daily, weekly, and monthly appointments for providers and resources, track multiple locations, and accept payments payment at check-in.
RXNT Patient Health Records ? Portal Dashboard. Enable patients to schedule appointments, send secure messages, review lab results, sign documents and forms, and pay bills online.
RXNT E-Prescribing. Keep track of and search for prescriptions and medication data, with easy access to Recent, Pending, Voided, and Refill prescriptions as well as Pharmacy Requests & Tasking.

related_products.short_desc: Make the switch today to see why 100,000+ health and wellness entrepreneurs trust SimplePractice to run their business.
related_products.features: Focus on clients while SimplePractice does the rest. Maximize your availability by giving clients the option to request appointments online. After you approve a request, you can send paperless intakes and insurance forms directly from the Client Portal. Set up AutoPay to get paid on time, every time. Reduce no-shows with unlimited appointment reminders. Work on-the-go with our mobile app and integrated telehealth platform. Sign up for a free, 30-day trial today to try it out for yourself.

related_products.short_desc: NextGen Healthcare provides ambulatory practices with award-winning solutions along with dedicated support & professional services.
related_products.features: NextGen Healthcare is a leading healthcare software and services company that empowers the transformation of ambulatory care. Our smart, electronic health record solutions - NextGen Office (1-10 physicians) and NextGen Enterprise (10+ physicians) - help ambulatory practices alleviate the burden of documentation, advance clinical outcomes, connect with other health systems, elevate provider and patient satisfaction, streamline the revenue cycle, and foster healthier communities.

related_products.short_desc: Mental health EMR/EHR & therapy notes software for practices of all sizes. Lots of features & reports. Easy to use. Free to try.
related_products.features:
EHR practice management software with Wiley Planners add-on, Telehealth for online therapy, mobile responsive interface, client portal, DSM/ICD codes, progress notes, treatment plans, discharge notes, review & co-sign notes, custom forms.  
Billing features: PQRS, claims & ERA/EOB, superbills, credit card service, batch invoice/claims.
Sync with Google/iCal. Voice, text, email reminders. 
Tons of reports included: Payroll, Staff Billing, etc. 
Unlimited document storage, unlimited support.

related_products.short_desc: 10to8 is Patient Management Software trusted by thousands of healthcare professionals and medical practices worldwide. Get started.
related_products.features:
10to8 is Patient Management Software trusted by thousands of healthcare professionals and medical practices worldwide.

Our patient scheduling & management software is proven to reduce appointment no-shows, improve patient communication and coordination, and ultimately, save you time. 

With automated SMS and email appointment reminders, our customers have reduced their no-show rates by up to 90%. With the added convenience of an online booking page, patients can book your free slots.

related_products.short_desc: AdvancedEHR: Save time & improve clinical outcomes with seamless data transfer, simple charting, ePrescribing, and telemedicine tools.
related_products.features: AdvancedMD EHR/EMR: Practice from anywhere. Run your entire practice from a single program, a single database and a single login. Seamless integration of your clinical & business technologies helps your staff chart, manage tasks, compare data & report for Meaningful Use or MACRA with ease. Our mobile IOS apps means you and your staff are never out of touch with your practice. Improve your physician/patient workflow with AdvancedEHR. Healthier practice = healthier patients.

related_products.short_desc: eClinicalWorks is a leader in healthcare IT, providing innovative, customizable Electronic Health Record (EHR) and Practice Management.
related_products.features: eClinicalWorks is a privately held leader in healthcare IT, providing comprehensive Electronic Health Record (EHR) and Practice Management (PM) solutions used by more than 850,000 providers in more than 20 countries.

related_products.short_desc: Modernize your practice with Jane: An all-in-one practice management solution with everything you need to create a thriving business.
related_products.features:
Allow us to introduce you to someone special, meet Jane! We're an all-in-one practice management solution with a team of real humans who want to help you manage and grow your business.

Available online and on any device, Jane offers branded online booking, beautiful scheduling, custom electronic documentation (EMR), online intake forms, patient reminders, integrated payment processing, and optional insurance management.

related_products.short_desc: The Ultimate Patient-1st Engagement Solution. For 20 years SR has been the benchmark by which all others measure themselves.
related_products.features: The Ultimate Patient-1st Engagement Solution. For 20 years SR has been the benchmark by which all others measure themselves. And we're still leading! Let us show you what you should expect from an integrated, patient acquisition and engagement solution!  As the individual practices we started out serving have grown, we've added specialized features for multi-unit operations. We now support many of the nation's largest health systems and retail-based networks.

related_products.short_desc: Manage & grow your clinic with one app that does It all. Goodbye endless phone calls, so-long paperwork, hello patient loyalty!
related_products.features: Grow your patient relationships with a powerful HIPAA complient CRM app by vcita. Store, manage and label your leads, contacts and patients in one centralized online hub. Get a birds-eye view of your patients' history appointments, payments, invoices, documents and conversations. Have all the information handy wherever you are and whenever you need it with a friendly mobile app and easily collaborate with your team, assigning patients, appointments and incoming requests to staff members.

related_products.short_desc: Over 200 different therapy note templates designed by industry professionals.  Simple, fast and easy to use.  Full-featured software.
related_products.features:
My Clients Plus is a leading provider of web-based billing and practice management software to healthcare industry.

Ideal for individual and group practices with focus on behavioral, occupational, speech, physical therapy and other healthcare specialties. HIPAA compliant and meeting insurance industry standards. Our affordable price and powerful features simply make us one of the best values ever.

Choose from over 200 therapy note templates designed by professionals like you.

related_products.short_desc: Caspio is the world's leading NO-CODE platform for building compliant healthcare applications without having to write code.
related_products.features: Caspio is the leading NO-CODE application development platform. Create hospital management software tailored to your exact requirements - from patient engagement to revenue cycle management and outcome dashboards. Caspio is HIPAA-compliant and can help you achieve HL7/FHIR data portability across your entire ecosystem. See why Caspio is trusted by leading healthcare organizations. Try FREE.

similar_products.short_desc: Take patient and member relationships to new heights with Salesforce Health Cloud.
similar_products.features: Health Cloud is the trusted, connected platform to power the business of health. By bringing together clinical and non-clinical data into a single source of truth, Health Cloud helps organizations gain a 360-degree view of each customer to elevate the health experience, drive proactive engagement, and influence the best outcomes. Health Cloud equips employees with purpose-built apps, automated industry workflows, and AI-powered customer insights to boost efficiency, collaboration, and growth

Reduce no-shows with unlimited appointment reminders. Work on-the-go with our mobile app and integrated telehealth platform. Sign up for a free, 30-day trial today to try it out for yourself.

similar_products.short_desc: Remote patient monitoring software that helps to reduce costs, improve outcomes, and increase patient satisfaction.
similar_products.features: Clear Arch Health offers the latest advancements in health monitoring and emergency response solution software to improve outcomes, reduce costs and streamline logistics. Offering a unique combined platform capable of supporting Remote Patient Monitoring (RPM) and/or Personal Emergency Response System (PERS) designed to support individual patients needs and offers the opportunity to white label your services to keep the patient connected to your organization.

similar_products.short_desc: CareStat uses SHPs comprehensive home health agency data and analytics, with agencies' permission only, to better manage patients.
similar_products.features:
What is CareStat?
A comprehensive post-acute analytics solution that connects acute care providers, ACOs, and physician
groups with skilled nursing (SNF) and home health agencies (HHA) to better manage patient outcomes,
operations, clinical protocols, and utilization. 

CareStat uses real- time OASIS and MDS data from home
health and SNF providers, supported by SHP unique quality measures, to better manage patients across
the continuum of care.

similar_products.short_desc: Manage & grow your clinic with one app that does It all. Goodbye endless phone calls, so-long paperwork, hello patient loyalty!

Get a birds-eye view of your patients' history appointments, payments, invoices, documents and conversations. Have all the information handy wherever you are and whenever you need it with a friendly mobile app and easily collaborate with your team, assigning patients, appointments and incoming requests to staff members.

similar_products.short_desc: Mytonomy Cloud for Healthcare is a video-based patient engagement solution that delivers award-winning short-form video content.
similar_products.features:
Mytonomy Cloud for Healthcare is a video-based patient engagement solution. Mytonomy works with leading institutions to elevate the patient experience, engage patients across the care continuum, and expand access to critical care across diverse populations. 

Their solution delivers award-winning short-form video content combined with intelligent surveys and dynamic communications proven to engage and empower patients with high satisfaction.

similar_products.short_desc: A HIPAA compliant client management software to organize your clients, case notes, organize and track community resources and more!
similar_products.features:
A HIPAA compliant client management software to organize your clients, case notes, organize and track community resources and more! 

In My Junna, you can easily enter case notes and access community resources from your phone. You can also organize and share those resources and track all of your incoming and outgoing referrals.  Run important detailed reports on your company as well as electronically sign case notes, contracts and more! Let My Junna simplify your day!

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud or Client Server based PM & EHR record solution with, referral management, quality reporting & E-Rx. ONC - ACB Certified 2015.
similar_products.features: (Cloud or Client Server Based) Practice Management & Electronic Health Record solution with features such as billing, E&M codes, intake card scanner capture, room view, clinical reporting, & electronic prescribing.Have access to a full patient history  every time. Move the patient from check-in, through the exam to checkout without ever handling a paper chart. Edit add photos & documentation on the fly. Create a cover letter, message to a referring doctor or generate any form with one click.

similar_products.short_desc: Experity Patient Engagement provides online self-scheduling & queue management solutions for healthcare organizations.
similar_products.features: Experity Patient Engagement formerly Clockwise.MD provides online self-scheduling and queue management solutions for urgent care clinics, health systems, hospitals, outpatient laboratory clinics, and specialty care clinics. Our customers experience a measurable increase in patient satisfaction, a reduction in wait times, and improved workflow efficiency.

similar_products.short_desc: Smart Care Routing is a self-service clinical AI chat system for symptom checking, virtual triage, and navigating healthcare journeys.
similar_products.features:
Clearstep's Smart Care Routing product uses clinical AI chat technology to improve patient-consumer experiences and engagement with healthcare organizations. Features three unique modules:

1. Virtual Triage: Empowers patient-consumers to triage themselves to the right care and services.

2. Clinical Journeys: Automates key patient-consumer touchpoints and reduces administrative burdens.

3. Patient Services: Streamlines patient follow-ups and remote monitoring workflows.

similar_products.short_desc: Sales Execution Platform built to help you sell faster. Prioritize leads & tasks, recommend actions, and help your team execute them.
similar_products.features:
LeadSquared is a sales, marketing, and field force automation platform that helps businesses improve their sales efficiency from all their channels and teams. 

Here are just some of the benefits that LeadSquared users have realized:
 Reduced lead leakage
 Intelligent Lead prioritization
 Automated sales and marketing processes
 Detailed sales and marketing analytics

Integrates with multiple business tools, no-code workflow builder, and low-code developer platform to help teams build processes.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top e-Prescribing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of e-Prescribing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: e-Prescribing software allows medical providers to transmit prescriptions to pharmacies electronically.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Electronic Medical Records software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Electronic Medical Records tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Electronic Medical Records software (EMR) automates the documentation, storage and retrieval of patient records. EMR software streamlines data entry, automates diagnosis and CPT code selection, minimizes required paper records, reduces transcription costs, provides up-to-date patient histories and reduces the turnaround time for patient visits and retrieving lab results. Using Electronic Medical Records solutions, doctors, offices and healthcare organizations save time, reduce medical errors, perform less paperwork and provide more accurate diagnoses for their patients. Electronic Medical Records software is related to Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Practice Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Practice Management software automates activities such as patient care, scheduling, billing, claims processing and other related operations for medical practices. By streamlining office workflows, doctors and their staff are able to spend more time with patients and less time on administrative tasks. Medical Practice Management applications can be utilized by private practices, community health centers, long term care and behavioral health facilities, hospitals and other health care organizations. Medical Practice Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mental Health software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mental Health tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mental Health software handles activities such as patient record keeping, billing, and scheduling for mental health facilities. Typically, Mental Health applications offer a variety of flexible features, which assist in the management and organization of patient records, progress notes, billing and invoicing, and staff and appointment scheduling. Mental health clinics use these applications to centralize and automate essential patient care and medical business processes including patient reporting generation, treatment records, accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, document management, electronic claims, collections, and financial reporting. Mental Health software is related to Human Services software, Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Patient Case Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Patient Case Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Patient Case Management software is used to manage and track patients within the healthcare and social services professions. This type of software is often used by social service agencies, non-profits, hospitals, and mental health clinics, to track, monitor, and report on the status of long and short term patients. Patient Case Management software is related to Mental Health software, Human Services software and Association Management software.
